price: 39 et que chacun ne recevra que le fruit de son labeur,
arabic: وَأَن لَّيۡسَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-an laysa lil'insāni illā mā saʿā
